name: Dead Heroes
description:
Dead Heroes

This is Dead Hero and his friends, your new adventure hero.
Hero escapes flames and flying shurikens and chased by huge cannons.
We are aiming for best free game 2017 or at least best free arcade.
And we believe soon it will be available at top-rated free games!

Addictive and raging hardcore gameplay
◆ Meet three levels!
◆ New game mode: Dzen!
◆ Multiplayer is coming soon!
◆ Train on single player to improve your skills
◆ Fun guaranteed
◆ One swipe control
◆ Compete with your friends
◆ Play without WiFi

Amazing features
◆ Journey(Die) through(in) colorful levels: green, snow, volcano, sunset.
◆ Collect over 10 characters: ninja, knight, halloween pumpkin, adventure girl, zombie with his girlfriend and more!

You love hardcore you’ll love it. To become a master, skills matter (a lot). So, start practicing right now to become a master and rule them all. It will be fun and addicting, we guarantee it!

◆ Play it anywhere and anytime
Internet connection is NOT necessary, so you can have fun playing in the subway, while flying on a plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on the toilet!)

◆ Low data usage
This free game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web.

◆ Compatibility and support
We're continuously working (hard) so that all Android phones and tablets run the game smoothly. please report any issue you may experience to amirapps1203@gmail.com.
